LanguageData.GR_Pounce.label: pounce
LanguageData.GR_Pounce.description: This hybrid can jump into combat, quickly closing the distance between it and its enemies.
LanguageData.GR_StraightCharge.label: charge
LanguageData.GR_StraightCharge.description: This hybrid can charge into combat, quickly closing the distance between it and its enemies and damaging them.
